!Amulet Seller Hakran: To be honest, I was surprised when I first arrived here. I think the Humans only wrote this much down due to the fact that their memories are so bad! Still, I must admit that I admire their dedication to preserving such a huge amount of lore. Our young Orcs could learn a great deal from traveling throughout this world. Strength and speed are not always sufficient in these dark days... [npc_%objectId%_TerritoryStatus|Ask about the local lord and tax rate.] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest.]
